DOC.brief_summary: To test safety tolerability ZD6474 combination withVinorelbine ( Navelbine ) Gemcitabine ( Gemzar ) plus cisplatin first line therapy patient locally advanced metastatic ( Stage IIIB-IV ) Non Small Cell Lung Cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Combination With Vinorelbine Gemcitabine Plus Cisplatin Locally Advanced Metastatic NSCLC
DOC.criteria: Confirmed non small cell lung cancer ( stage IIIBIV ) Life expectancy great 12 week At least 1 measurable lesion great 10mm small diameter . Prior treatment anticancer agent Brain metastases Major surgery within last 4 week
